techmeme.title: Apple rolls out CarPlay Ultra, the next-generation of CarPlay, in new and existing Aston Martins in North America after long delays, ahead of a wider rollout (Benjamin Mayo/9to5Mac)
How the US conducted a monthslong campaign to push Gambia and at least four other developing nations to give Starlink licenses; diplomats call the move alarming (ProPublica)
Hedra, which offers a web-based video generation and editing suite powered by its Character-3 model, raised a $32M Series A led by a16z, following a $10M seed (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
IFI Claims: Google passes IBM to lead in generative AI-related patent applications in the US; Google and Nvidia lead agentic AI patent filings globally (Ina Fried/Axios)
Proofpoint agrees to acquire German company Hornetsecurity, which specializes in managed cloud-based email security services, for $1B, set to close in H2 2025 (Ryan Browne/CNBC)
